languages.text: {n}Вереница шепотков неразборчивым гомоном вырывается из глотки псайкера, прежде чем ей удается найти среди них свой голос и ответить.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, у меня никогда и не было иного выбора. Вы раскрыли нам... нет, мне! МНЕ! Да, {d|Encyclopedia:CompIdira_Chaos}мне глаза вы раскрыли{/d}. Я больше не боюсь того, что за дверью, потому что теперь я точно знаю. Знаю, что с вами мне ничего не грозит. Спасибо".

{n}An unintelligible clamour of whispers erupts from the psyker's throat, and it takes a few seconds for her to find her own voice among them and respond.{/n} "Lord Captain, I never had any other choice. You opened our— no, my! MY! Yes, you {d|Encyclopedia:CompIdira_Chaos}opened my eyes{/d}. I'm no longer scared of what's behind the door, because now I know for sure. I know nothing can threaten me when I'm with you. Thank you."
languages.original_text: {n}Вереница шепотков неразборчивым гомоном вырывается из глотки псайкера, прежде чем ей удается найти среди них свой голос и ответить.{/n} "Лорд-капитан, у меня никогда и не было иного выбора. Вы раскрыли нам... нет, мне! МНЕ! Да, {d|Encyclopedia:CompIdira_Chaos}мне глаза вы раскрыли{/d}. Я больше не боюсь того, что за дверью, потому что теперь я точно знаю. Знаю, что с вами мне ничего не грозит. Спасибо".

You opened our— no, my! MY! Yes, you opened my eyes. I'm no longer scared of what's behind the door, because now I know for sure. I know nothing can threaten me when I'm with you. Thank you."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

I know nothing can threaten me when I'm with you. Thank you."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Una cacofonía ininteligible de susurros brota de la garganta de la psíquica, que tarda unos segundos en hallar su propia voz entre ellas y responder.{/n} «Lord Capitán, no tuve ninguna elección. Ha abierto nuestros oj... ¡no, mis ojos! ¡Los MÍOS! Sí, me ha {d|Encyclopedia:CompIdira_Chaos}abierto los ojos{/d}. Ya no temo lo que hay al otro lado de la puerta, porque sé bien lo que es. Sé que no corro ningún peligro cuando estoy con usted. Gracias».
languages.original_text: {n}An unintelligible clamour of whispers erupts from the psyker's throat, and it takes a few seconds for her to find her own voice among them and respond.{/n} "Lord Captain, I never had any other choice. You opened our— no, my! MY! Yes, you {d|Encyclopedia:CompIdira_Chaos}opened my eyes{/d}. I'm no longer scared of what's behind the door, because now I know for sure. I know nothing can threaten me when I'm with you. Thank you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Una cacofonía ininteligible de susurros brota de la garganta de la psíquica, que tarda unos segundos en hallar su propia voz entre ellas y responder.{/n} «Lord Capitán, no tuve ninguna elección. Ha abierto nuestros oj... ¡no, mis ojos! ¡Los MÍOS! Sí, me ha abierto los ojos. Ya no temo lo que hay al otro lado de la puerta, porque sé bien lo que es. Sé que no corro ningún peligro cuando estoy con usted. Gracias».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}異能者の喉から意味不明な囁き声が飛び出し、その中から自分の声を見つけて返事をするまでに数秒を要した。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、あたいに選択の余地はなかったの。陛下はあたいの―そんな！嘘！ええ、そうよ。{d|Encyclopedia:CompIdira_Chaos}あたいの目を開いてくれた{/d}わ！ようやく確信を持てるようになったから、もはや扉の奥に何があるのか恐れてなんかいないわ。陛下といれば何も恐れることはないとわかったんだもの。ありがとう」
languages.original_text: {n}An unintelligible clamour of whispers erupts from the psyker's throat, and it takes a few seconds for her to find her own voice among them and respond.{/n} "Lord Captain, I never had any other choice. You opened our— no, my! MY! Yes, you {d|Encyclopedia:CompIdira_Chaos}opened my eyes{/d}. I'm no longer scared of what's behind the door, because now I know for sure. I know nothing can threaten me when I'm with you. Thank you."

traits.locale_text: {n}異能者の喉から意味不明な囁き声が飛び出し、その中から自分の声を見つけて返事をするまでに数秒を要した。{/n}「ロード・キャプテン、あたいに選択の余地はなかったの。陛下はあたいの―そんな！嘘！ええ、そうよ。{d|Encyclopedia:CompIdira_Chaos}あたいの目を開いてくれた{/d}わ！ようやく確信を持てるようになったから、もはや扉の奥に何があるのか恐れてなんかいないわ。陛下といれば何も恐れることはないとわかったんだもの。ありがとう」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉喉咙里爆发出一连串难以理解的低语，她花了好几秒钟才恢复了自己原本的声音，回答着你的问题。{/n}“舰长大人，我当时根本别无选择。是你开拓了我们的——不，是我的！我的！没错，是你让我{d|Encyclopedia:CompIdira_Chaos}看到了真理{/d}。我不再惧怕门后的东西，因为现在我可以确定，只要和你在一起，就没有任何东西能威胁到我。谢谢你。”
languages.original_text: {n}An unintelligible clamour of whispers erupts from the psyker's throat, and it takes a few seconds for her to find her own voice among them and respond.{/n} "Lord Captain, I never had any other choice. You opened our— no, my! MY! Yes, you {d|Encyclopedia:CompIdira_Chaos}opened my eyes{/d}. I'm no longer scared of what's behind the door, because now I know for sure. I know nothing can threaten me when I'm with you. Thank you."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉喉咙里爆发出一连串难以理解的低语，她花了好几秒钟才恢复了自己原本的声音，回答着你的问题。{/n}“舰长大人，我当时根本别无选择。是你开拓了我们的——不，是我的！我的！没错，是你开拓了我的眼界。我不再惧怕门后的东西，因为现在我可以确定，只要和你在一起，就没有任何东西能威胁到我。谢谢你。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Une clameur de murmures inintelligibles jaillit de la gorge de la psyker et il lui faut quelques secondes pour retrouver sa propre voix parmi eux.{/n} « Je n'ai jamais eu d'autre choix, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Vous nous avez ouvert... Non ! Vous M'AVEZ {d|Encyclopedia:CompIdira_Chaos}ouvert les yeux{/d}. Je n'ai plus peur maintenant que je sais ce qui se trouve derrière la porte. Je sais que je ne risque rien quand je suis avec vous. Merci. »
languages.original_text: {n}An unintelligible clamour of whispers erupts from the psyker's throat, and it takes a few seconds for her to find her own voice among them and respond.{/n} "Lord Captain, I never had any other choice. You opened our— no, my! MY! Yes, you {d|Encyclopedia:CompIdira_Chaos}opened my eyes{/d}. I'm no longer scared of what's behind the door, because now I know for sure. I know nothing can threaten me when I'm with you. Thank you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Une clameur de murmures inintelligibles jaillit de la gorge de la psyker et il lui faut quelques secondes pour retrouver sa propre voix parmi eux.{/n} « Je n'ai jamais eu d'autre choix, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Vous nous avez ouvert... Non ! Vous M'AVEZ ouvert les yeux. Je n'ai plus peur maintenant que je sais ce qui se trouve derrière la porte. Je sais que je ne risque rien quand je suis avec vous. Merci. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: {n}Ein unverständliches Gewirr von flüsternden Stimmen bricht aus der Kehle der Psionikerin hervor. Es dauert einige Sekunden, bis sie darin ihre eigene Stimme findet und antwortet.{/n} "Lord Captain, ich hatte keine andere Wahl. Ihr habt uns – nein, mir! MIR! Ja, Ihr habt mir {d|Encyclopedia:CompIdira_Chaos}die Augen geöffnet{/d}. Ich habe keine Angst mehr davor, was hinter der Tür liegt, weil ich es jetzt mit Gewissheit weiß. Ich weiß, dass mich nichts bedrohen kann, wenn ich bei Euch bin. Danke."
languages.original_text: {n}An unintelligible clamour of whispers erupts from the psyker's throat, and it takes a few seconds for her to find her own voice among them and respond.{/n} "Lord Captain, I never had any other choice. You opened our— no, my! MY! Yes, you {d|Encyclopedia:CompIdira_Chaos}opened my eyes{/d}. I'm no longer scared of what's behind the door, because now I know for sure. I know nothing can threaten me when I'm with you. Thank you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein unverständliches Gewirr von flüsternden Stimmen bricht aus der Kehle der Psionikerin hervor. Es dauert einige Sekunden, bis sie darin ihre eigene Stimme findet und antwortet.{/n} "Lord Captain, ich hatte keine andere Wahl. Ihr habt uns — nein, mir! MIR! Ja, Ihr habt mir die Augen geöffnet. Ich habe keine Angst mehr davor, was hinter der Tür liegt, weil ich es jetzt mit Gewissheit weiß. Ich weiß, dass mich nichts bedrohen kann, wenn ich bei Euch bin. Danke."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

You opened our— no, my! MY! Yes, you opened my eyes. I'm no longer scared of what's behind the door, because now I know for sure. I know nothing can threaten me when I'm with you. Thank you."

languages.text: {n}Ruhsezerin dudaklarından anlaşılmaz fısıltılarla dolu bir feryat kopuyor. Tüm o seslerin arasından kendi sesini seçerek cevap vermesi birkaç saniye sürüyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan, başka şansım yoktu. Gözlerimizi... Hayır. GÖZLERİMİ! {d|Encyclopedia:CompIdira_Chaos}Gözlerimi açtın{/d}. Kapının ardındakiler artık beni korkutmuyor. Çünkü biliyorum ki yanında olduğum sürece hiçbiri tehlike arz edemez. Teşekkür ederim."
languages.original_text: {n}An unintelligible clamour of whispers erupts from the psyker's throat, and it takes a few seconds for her to find her own voice among them and respond.{/n} "Lord Captain, I never had any other choice. You opened our— no, my! MY! Yes, you {d|Encyclopedia:CompIdira_Chaos}opened my eyes{/d}. I'm no longer scared of what's behind the door, because now I know for sure. I know nothing can threaten me when I'm with you. Thank you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ruhsezerin dudaklarından anlaşılmaz fısıltılarla dolu bir feryat kopuyor. Tüm o seslerin arasından kendi sesini seçerek cevap vermesi birkaç saniye sürüyor.{/n} "Lord Kaptan, başka şansım yoktu. Gözlerimizi... Hayır. GÖZLERİMİ! Benim gözlerimi açtın. Kapının ardında neler olduğu artık beni korkutmuyor. Çünkü biliyorum ki yanında olduğum sürece hiçbiri tehlike arz edemez. Teşekkür ederim."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
